text: Barney Travers (1894 – February 1955) was an English professional footballer who played as a forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1894 births Category:1955 deaths Category:People from Sunderland, Tyne and Wear Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Oak Villa F.C. players Category:Sunderland West End F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Fulham F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Barney Travers
